Package renderer.scene.primitives

Class TriangleFan

java.lang.Object
renderer.scene.primitives.Primitive
renderer.scene.primitives.OrientablePrimitive
renderer.scene.primitives.TriangleFan
public class TriangleFan extends OrientablePrimitive
A TriangleFan object has n+2 integers that represent the vertices of n triangles that radiate from a central point and another n+1 integers that represent the Color at each of those vertices.

The integers are indices into the Vertex and Color lists of a Model object.

See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Triangle_fan

  • Constructor Details

    • TriangleFan

      public TriangleFan(int... indices)
      Construct a TriangleFan with the given array of indices for the Vertex and Color index lists.

      NOTE: This constructor does not put any Vertex or Color objects into this Primitive's Model object. This constructor assumes that the given indices are valid (or will be valid by the time this Primitive gets rendered).

      Parameters:
      indices - array of vertex and color indices to place in this TriangleFan

  • Method Details

    • setBackFaceColorIndex

      public void setBackFaceColorIndex(int c0, int c1, int c2)
      Give the triangles of this TriangleFan the back face colors indexed by the given color indices. The first color is for the center of the triangle fan. The other two colors will alternate around the periphery of the triangle fan.

      NOTE: This method does not put any Color objects into this TriangleFan's Model object. This method assumes that the given indices is valid (or will be valid by the time this TriangleFan gets rendered).

      Parameters:
      c0 - integer back face color index for this TriangleFan
      c1 - integer back face color index for this TriangleFan
      c2 - integer back face color index for this TriangleFan
